name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんとプロデューサーさんの分、
これくらい買っていけばいいかな～
trans: Would this be enough for Tenka and Producer, do you think?

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんにはラムネでしょー、
後人形焼きもあるしー……
trans: A Ramune for Tenka... Oh, and there's ningyo-yaki, too.

name: 甘奈
text:
プロデューサーさんには、たこ焼きと焼きそば！
……あっ、何か串焼きとかもあった方が良いかな！
trans:
And for Producer, some takoyaki and yakisoba!
Ah, and some grilled skewers would be good too.

name: 千雪
text:
そうね……でもたくさん買ったし、
１回戻って、また足りなくなったら買いに出ましょう？
trans:
Maybe... but we have a lot of food already.
Perhaps we can come back later if we don't have enough.

name: 甘奈
text: そっか、甜花ちゃんたちも待ってるもんね☆
trans: Good idea. Don't want to keep them waiting, right?

name: 甘奈
text: 色んなお店があるから目移りしちゃって～……
trans: There are so many stalls I get dizzy looking at them all!

name: 千雪
text:
わかるなぁ、やっぱりこういうところって
ドキドキするもの
trans:
I know, right?
I can't help but get excited at festivals like this.

name: 甘奈
text:
うんうん！　甘奈もね、ちっちゃい頃はよく
甜花ちゃんと一緒に縁日とか来てたんだけど──
trans: Yeah! I used to go to shrine festivals and stuff a lot with Tenka when we were small.

name: 甘奈
text: あっ、射的もある
trans: Oh, they have a shooting gallery as well!

name: 千雪
text: ふたりで、よくやってたとか？
trans: Did you play that a lot when you went to festivals, too?

name: 甘奈
text: ううん、逆かなー
trans: No, hardly ever in fact...

name: 甘奈
text:
１回ね、すっごく頑張った時があったんだ
でも結局獲れなくって
trans: There was one time when we tried really hard, but in the end we got naught for our efforts.

name: 千雪
text: そうなの……
trans: Oh my...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんも甘奈もほしいなって思ったぬいぐるみでね、
ふたりしてお小遣いを出し合ってはみたものの……
trans: There was a stuffed toy that we both liked, so we thought if we put together all our pocket money...

name: 甘奈
text:
もーう全然ダメだった☆
まず上手く狙えないの、鉄砲重いし
trans:
Anyway, it was a complete disaster!
We couldn't aim well. The guns were too heavy for us, you see...

name: 甘奈
text:
……それでね、甜花ちゃんが、
甘奈のほしいものが獲れなかったからって泣いてくれて
trans: And then Tenka started to cry. She felt so bad about not being able to get the stuffed toy that I wanted...

name: 甘奈
text:
……あの時、甜花ちゃんはやっぱり、
甘奈のお姉ちゃんなんだなーって思ったんだ
trans:
At that moment,
I felt that Tenka really is my older sister.

name: 甘奈
text:
その後、甘奈もつられて泣いちゃってさ
ふたりで大泣き。えへへ……
trans: And then, I got swept along too. The two of us wailing our eyes out... We must have made quite the spectacle. Ehehe...

name: 千雪
text: そっか……
trans: I see...

name: 千雪
text: ……ね、それなら、今からやってみない？
trans: Well... why don't we try playing a round now?

name: 甘奈
text: えっ、射的を？
trans: Huh? The shooting gallery?

name: 千雪
text: そう！
trans: Yes!

name: 千雪
text:
だって、みんなどんどん変わっていくものでしょう？
……今度は、きっと獲れるんじゃないかしら
trans:
You've grown since then. Who knows?
You might win something this time.

name: 千雪
text:
だから──どうかな？
それで、これも甜花ちゃんのお土産にしちゃうの
trans:
What do you say?
It'll be a nice souvenir for Tenka.

name: 甘奈
text: うんっ！
trans: Okay!

name: 甘奈
text: あ～っ！　ダメだぁ……次で最後だよ～……！
trans: Agh! I failed... And there's only one shot left...

name: 千雪
text: ……脇をしめて、狙いを定める──
trans: ...Keep your elbows in, and steady your aim...

name: 甘奈
text: え？
trans: What?

name: 千雪
text:
……この間のゲームの時に教えてもらったこと、
思い出したの
trans: ...I was just thinking back to what Tenka taught me at the game center.

name: 千雪
text:
狙いを安定させるためには、
脇をしめると良いって甜花ちゃんが
trans: About keeping your elbows in order to keep your aim steady.

name: 甘奈
text: ──！　……わかった。やってみる！
trans: I see. I'll try it!

name: 甘奈
text: ──ちゃんと、狙って──……！
trans: Aim... and...!

name: 甘奈
text: あっ──
trans: Ah!

name: 千雪
text:
すごいすごい！
甘奈ちゃんおめでとう！
trans:
Amazing!
Congratulations, Amana!

name: 甘奈
text:
う、うんっ……！
ホントに……獲れちゃった……！
trans:
Y-Yeah!
I actually... won a prize!

name: 甘奈
text: ……えへへ、かわいーなぁ……☆
trans: Ehehe... It's so cute...

name: 甘奈
text: ……甘奈、今度はちゃんと獲れたんだね……
trans: I really won this time, didn't I?

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんが誘ってくれて、
甜花ちゃんのアドバイスがあったから……
trans: Thanks to Chiyuki's encouragement, and Tenka's advice.

name: 甘奈
trans: Ehehe!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんにも、早く見せなくちゃ！
trans: I've gotta show Tenka right away!

name: 千雪
text: ええ、急ぎましょう♪
trans: Yes. Let's head back!

name: プロデューサー
text: ……お、戻ってきたな
trans: Oh, you're back.

name: 千雪
text:
すみません
ちょっと寄り道をしてて……遅くなっちゃいました
trans:
Sorry we're late.
We stopped by a few places on the way.

name: プロデューサー
text: 寄り道？
trans: Oh, you did?

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃん、ほら
trans: Psst, Amana!

name: 甘奈
text: うん──
trans: Oh!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、これ
……ぬいぐるみ、射的で獲ってきたんだ
trans:
Tenka, I won this stuffed toy at the shooting gallery.
It's for you.

name: 甜花
text: 射的……
trans: Shooting gallery?

name: 甜花
text:
そっか……
なーちゃんが獲ってくれたんだ……
trans:
I see...
So Na-chan won it for me...

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……甜花、お姉ちゃんなのに
獲ってもらっちゃった……
trans: Nihehe... Tenka's the big sister, yet her little sister had to win it for her...

name: 甘奈
text: 違うよ、甜花ちゃん
trans: Not so, Tenka.

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈ね、この間甜花ちゃんが千雪さんに言ってた、
撃つ時のコツを参考にしたの
trans:
Chiyuki told me the technique
you taught her at the game center.

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さんが教えてくれたんだ
trans: And I took that advice.

name: 甘奈
text: ──だからね、これはみんなで獲ったんだよ
trans: So you see? It was because of you that I was able to win it.

name: 甘奈
text: みんなだから、獲れたの……☆
trans: So this win belongs to all of us!

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……
trans: Na-chan...

name: 甜花
text:
……そっか。……そうだね
にへへ……
trans:
I see...
You're right... Nihehe...

name: 甜花
text: ありがと、なーちゃん……千雪さん……
trans: Thanks, Na-chan... Chiyuki...

name: 甘奈
text: 次はどこに行こっかー？
trans: Well, where do we want to go next?

name: 甜花
text:
人……ちょっと、少なくなった……から……
甜花……もう大丈夫……！
trans:
People are beginning to disperse now...
so Tenka... is happy to go anywhere!

name: 甘奈
text:
すごい！
いつになく張りきってるね甜花ちゃん！
trans:
Great!
You're an eager beaver today, aren't you, Tenka?

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……だって、一緒だと、楽しい……！
trans: Nihehe... That's because I'm having fun... with everyone...!

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、甘奈も同意☆
trans: Ehehe, I agree!

name: 千雪
text:
──ねぇ、ふたりとも
りんご飴、買ってもいいかな？
trans:
Everyone, would it be alright
if I buy a candy apple?

name: 甘奈
text: もちろん☆　行こ行こっ
trans: Of course! Let's go!

name: 甜花
text: そこに……屋台、出てる……
trans: There are food stalls set up over there...

name: 甘奈
text: ホントだ！
trans: It's true!

name: 甘奈
text:
……お兄さん、すみませーん！
りんご飴ひとつ──でいいんだよね千雪さん？
trans:
Excuse me!
One candy apple... Will that be enough, Chiyuki?

name: 千雪
text:
ええ
──りんご飴をひとつ、お願いします
trans:
Yes.
One candy apple, please.

name: 千雪
text: ありがとうございます
trans: Thank you.

name: 甜花
text:
ふわ……
まぁるくって……綺麗……
trans:
Fuwah...
It's so round... and pretty...

name: 甘奈
text:
だねー☆
それに、すっごいつやつやだ～
trans:
Right?
And it's so shiny...

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ
trans: Fufu.

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃん、甘奈ちゃん
これ……３人で食べない？
trans: Tenka, Amana, shall we eat it together?

name: 甘奈
text:
え、でも……
千雪さんがほしかったんじゃないの？
trans: Is that really okay? You bought it, so it's yours.

name: 千雪
text:
そうなんだけど……
私、りんご飴って、ひとりで食べきれたことがないの
trans: Even so, I've never been able to eat a whole candy-apple by myself.

name: 千雪
text: だから……一緒に食べてもらえないかな？
trans: So could I ask you two to help me eat it?

name: 甘奈＆甜花
text: うん！
trans: Okay!

name: 甜花
text: あー……
trans: Nom...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん待って待って！
『いただきます』がまだだよ！
trans:
Tenka, wait!
You forgot to say "Let's eat"!

name: 甜花
text:
あ……そうだった……
にへへ……
trans:
Ah, oops...
Nihehe...

name: 千雪
text: そんな、気にしなくていいのに
trans: It's alright. You don't have to be polite.

name: 甘奈
text:
ダメダメ、せっかく３人で食べるんだもん
３人で『いただきます』しなきゃ！
trans: No, no, if we're gonna eat it together, we gotta say "Let's eat!" together too!

name: 甜花
text:
甜花となーちゃんの……
分けっこの合図、だから……
trans: It's what Tenka and Na-chan always say when we're sharing something.

name: 千雪
text: まぁ……！
trans: Oh my...!

name: 甘奈
text:
ね？　だからみんなで！
せーの──
trans:
Ready?
All together then... 3, 2, 1...

name: 一同
text: いただきます
trans: Let's eat!
